product_name: Soleus Dash Digital Watch - Small - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Water resistant to 50m with an easy to read display, the small Dash watch delivers data essentials at a glance, keeping you well-informed and moving on daylight, predawn and rainy-day runs.
short_description: Water resistant to 50m with an easy to read display, the small Dash watch delivers data essentials at a glance, keeping you well-informed and moving on daylight, predawn and rainy-day runs.
